bibl.title: Studies in Late Byzantine Land-Leases. A Dissertation Presented to the Faculty of Princeton University in Candidacy for the Degree of Doctor of Philosophy.
bibl.note: Reproduction anastatique (précédée d'un "Foreword", 2 pp.) de: Prolegomena to a Study of Late-Byzantine Land-Leases, Aegyptus 13 (1933) pp. 589-609; - Amantius and the Date of C.P.R. 247, AJA 37 (1933) pp. 287-288; - Late Byzantine Land-Leases "eph' hoson chronon boulei", Aegyptus 14 (1934) pp. 80-88; - Notes on "Requests" and "cheirographa" Among Late Byzantine Land-Leases, Aegyptus 14 (1934) pp. 286-292; - The Crops of an Indiction in Late Byzantine Land-Leases, Aegyptus 14 (1934) pp. 429-446; - Dioscore d'Aphroditô: Cinq locations de terres, REG 49 (1936) pp. 293-299; - Emphyteusis Among the Papyri, Aegyptus 17 (1937) pp. 3-24.
bibl.seg: Comfort Howard, Studies in Late Byzantine Land-Leases. A Dissertation Presented to the Faculty of Princeton University in Candidacy for the Degree of Doctor of Philosophy.

Reproduction anastatique (précédée d'un "Foreword", 2 pp.) de: Prolegomena to a Study of Late-Byzantine Land-Leases, Aegyptus 13 (1933) pp. 589-609; - Amantius and the Date of C.P.R. 247, AJA 37 (1933) pp. 287-288; - Late Byzantine Land-Leases "eph' hoson chronon boulei", Aegyptus 14 (1934) pp. 80-88; - Notes on "Requests" and "cheirographa" Among Late Byzantine Land-Leases, Aegyptus 14 (1934) pp. 286-292; - The Crops of an Indiction in Late Byzantine Land-Leases, Aegyptus 14 (1934) pp. 429-446; - Dioscore d'Aphroditô: Cinq locations de terres, REG 49 (1936) pp. 293-299; - Emphyteusis Among the Papyri, Aegyptus 17 (1937) pp. 3-24.
